property.name: mapreduce.task.timeout
property.description: The number of milliseconds before a task will be terminated if it neither reads an input, writes an output, nor updates its status string. A value of 0 disables the timeout.

property.name: mapreduce.map.memory.mb
property.description: The amount of memory to request from the scheduler for each map task.

property.name: mapreduce.job.running.map.limit
property.description: The maximum number of simultaneous map tasks per job. There is no limit if this value is 0 or negative.

property.name: mapreduce.job.queuename
property.description: Queue to which a job is submitted. This must match one of the queues defined in mapred-queues.xml for the system. Also, the ACL setup for the queue must allow the current user to submit a job to the queue. Before specifying a queue, ensure that the system is configured with the queue, and access is allowed for submitting jobs to the queue.
